salute:
Your request is being processed.
AirtelTigo, life is simple

non_bio_registration.1:
Link your phone number with NIA card details.
Enter the customer's MSISDN
non_bio_registration.2: Enter last Six Digit of ICCID
non_bio_registration.3:
Enter the customer's Ghana card number.
Eg: (GHA-123456789-9)
non_bio_registration.7:
Enter the customer's date of birth (DDMMYYYY).
Eg: 08101990
non_bio_registration.9: If AirtelTigo Money, enter Next of Kin Full name

non_bio_registration_mfs.1:
Link your phone number with NIA card details.
Enter customer's MSISDN
non_bio_registration_mfs.2:
Enter customer's Ghana card number
Eg: (GHA-123456789-9)
non_bio_registration_mfs.6:
Enter the customer's date of birth (DDMMYYYY).
Eg: 08101990
non_bio_registration_mfs.7: Enter full name of Next Of Kin

bio_re_registration.1:
Link your phone number with NIA card details.
Enter customer's MSISDN
bio_re_registration.2:
Enter customer's Ghana card number.
Eg: (GHA-123456789-9)
